name: St. Azamina
desc:
1 Level 6 or higher Fusion Monster + 1 Level 6 or higher Synchro Monster
Your opponent cannot target this card, cards they control, and cards in their GY and banishment with card effects, also they take any battle damage you would have taken instead. If this card was Fusion Summoned this turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 Level 9 or lower "Azamina" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck. You can only use this effect of "St. Azamina" once per turn.
